title.narrative: F.a: Strengthening community participation mechanisms to ensure free prior and informed consent to enhance corporate accountability in Uganda

description.narrative: The projects seeks to: 1. strengthen community participation platforms to ensure continuous engagements with all stakeholders at all levels of project implementation 2. consolidate actions within all UCCA members and other CBOs in promoting respect for hum an rights and accountability for corporate abuses and 3. build capacities of UCCA members and other stakeholders working around business and human rights on the proposed thematic areas and project management. The goal is to enhance community capacities to self advocate and enhance corporate accountability in Uganda. www.ucca-uganda.org
